meanings.definition: A publication that comes out once a week and contains news and articles.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading newsweeklies to stay updated on current events.
meanings.sent2: Many people subscribe to newsweeklies for their reliable news coverage.
meanings.sent3: The newsweeklies were so full of interesting stories, I couldn't put them down!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a stack of newsweeklies, filled with information waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The colorful covers of the newsweeklies caught my eye at the store.
